matchPreview.label: FC Fassell will face their long-time rivals Rayon FC in what promises to be an exciting Liberia Premier League clash. Both teams are in good form, with Kigali Lonestar winning their last three matches and Rayon FC unbeaten in their last five.

The last time these two teams met, Kigali Lonestar emerged victorious with a 2-1 win, thanks to goals from Jean-Pierre Karekezi and Emmanuel Mugisha. Rayon FC will be looking to avenge that defeat and close the gap at the top of the table.

Kigali Lonestar's head coach has emphasized the importance of maintaining their winning streak to keep their title hopes alive. The team has been training intensively for this match, focusing on defensive organization and quick counter-attacks.

Fans can expect an electric atmosphere at Amahoro Stadium as these two giants of Rwandan football battle for supremacy. With both teams known for their attacking style of play, this match promises goals and excitement.

highlights.title: FC Fassell 2-1 Bright Stars FC
highlights.description: Jean-Pierre Karekezi scores a goal for FC Fassell in the 2nd minute of the game. Emmanuel Mugisha scores a goal for Bright Stars FC in the 30th minute of the game.
